about_the_game:
Get ready for a blast from the past with Super Trailblazers, a retro-inspired, local multiplayer arcade game! Up to 4 players face off on a neon grid, with the hopes of being the last driver standing. As you race around, you leave behind a neon trail of light - forcing you to weave and dodge through the constantly changing landscape.

MULTIPLAYER ONLY

Super Trailblazers requires at least two players to start the battle. This means one player can play using the keyboard, and controllers are required for any additional players.

DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY

Disrupt the competition with an array of exciting abilities. Dash forward to cut off your rivals, launch missiles to blast through walls or strike your foes down head on, lay down bombs to clear your path, and even go invisible to flank enemies or make a daring escape.

The competition is fierce, the action is electric, so grab your controllers, fire up Super Trailblazers, and prepare for an unforgettable party experience!

name: Super Trailblazers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible graphics card, integrated graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: A fast-paced, local multiplayer arcade game. Race around a neon grid with your friends, strategically weaving through the trails of light you leave behind. Use clever tactics and special abilities like missiles, bombs, and invisibility to be the last driver standing!
